name: everwiki
description: EverWiki is an EverNote clone looking to present notes in a personal Wiki format. Notes are created by users and associated to notebooks via topics. EverWiki then presents notes by their associations in a clean, encyclopedic format. EverWiki is geared towards users looking to categorizing personal notes on technical topics, especially code.

scripts.install: npm --prefix backend install backend && npm --prefix frontend install frontend
